issue.title: [CF 378] reactive spell bug
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.112, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1

Installed Version

4.7.1

Description

raging blow wont work out with the new updated version.

Installed Addons

Ace3 - Release-r1041 AtlasLoot Enhanced - v6.05.01-nolib Auction Profit - v1.4 Auctionator - Version 3.0.0 BattlegroundTargets - 40300-1 BGAutoRelease - 1.2 CallbackHandler-1.0 - 1.0.7 Castbars - 3.27 DDR - DocsDebugRunes - DDR - DocsDebugRunes r26 Deadly Boss Mods - 4.10.4-77-g3d5074e Deadly Boss Mods - LibDataBroker - Deadly Boss Mods - LibDataBroker r13 Deadly Boss Mods - WotLK, BC and Vanilla mods - DBM-v4-r364 Old Content Mods ExtraCD - 0.9.2a GatherMate2 - 1.16 GatherMate2_Data - v7.6 GladiatorlosSA - r430.02 Gladius - v2.0.16-beta GTFO - 4.11.2 KillTheHealer! - KillTheHealer-1.2 LibBabble-Boss-3.0 - 4.3-release2 LibBabble-Faction-3.0 - 4.3-release2 LibBabble-Inventory-3.0 - 4.3-release2 LibBabble-ItemSet-3.0 - 4.3-release2 LibBabble-Zone-3.0 - 4.3-release2 LibDBIcon-1.0 - r20 LibInternalCooldowns-1.0 - r23 LibStub - 1.0.2-40200 LoseControl - LoseControl 4.21 MailOpener - v1.2.15 Mapster - 1.4.3 MoveAnything - 12.2.3 NugComboBar - NugComboBar 4.2.3 Omen Threat Meter - v3.1.5 OmniCC - 4.3.0 Postal - v3.4.12 Prospect Me - Prospect Me 1.0.0 RageBar - RageBar v 2.2 RatingBuster - 1.6.5 ReforgeLite - v1.09.2 SexyMap - v1.2.5 Skada Damage Meter - 1.3-10 TellMeWhen - 4.7.1 Tidy Plates - 6.4.8.5 Tidy Plates: Threat Plates - 5.4 Tol Barad Master - Tol Barad Master v1.4 UnicodeFont - 1.8.5 VuhDo - VuhDo 2.127 xanMortarPestle - v1.8


> Posted by CurseForge user jtelfmoo | Imported from CurseForge issue #378 | Raw

comments.body:
Dear Curse,

Please disable the ability to submit tickets from the curse client. They are never informative, don't use my ticket template, and never include the information needed to solve the problem.

Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
